mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_PROJECT SET USERAUTH = 'LEADER' WHERE USERNO=#{USERNO}
UPDATE MEMBER_PROJECT SET USERAUTH = 'CAN_EDIT' WHERE USERNO=#{USERNO}
UPDATE MEMBER_PROJECT SET USERAUTH = 'ONLY_READ' WHERE USERNO=#{USERNO}
UPDATE MEMBER_PROJECT SET USERAUTH = 'ONLY_READ' WHERE PROJECTNO=#{PROJECTNO}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(USERNO, 0) USERNO FROM MEMBER_PROJECT INNER JOIN MEMBER USING(USERNO) WHERE PROJECTNO = #{PROJECTNO} AND USERAUTH != 'LEADER' AND rownum = 1 ORDER BY PROJECTJOINDATE ASC
